info.description:
Purchase Order Management Service for Microservices Challenge
Provides purchase order management (CRUD operations, receive, pay)
info.title: Purchase Service API

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token. Example: "Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..."
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
